page.title: 08A SCHOOL GIRLS LEISURE TIME
page.content: In my leisure time, on a Monday I go to The Guides. There are all different patrols there. I am in Kingfishers. I have hobbies like drawing, walking, collecting rubbers, badges and stamps. At night I usually play tennis or badminton with my dad. Sometimes on a Saturday I go to the Rolla Disco Club at the Sports Centre. Most nights I play with Jenny Clayton. In the weekends I play on my roller skates down the street. Some nights I stay in the house and do drawing and colouring and I put my tapes on whilst I'm doing it. My sisters and I play in our street or our garden. My friends and I go for bike rides. Before I go to sleep at night I read a book.
